Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model.Game

public class Game extends Object implements GameInterface, Serializable
This class represents a Game It implements GameInterface

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int numberPlayers) throws NumberPlayerWrongException
      This constructor creates a new Game
      Parameters:
      numberPlayers - the number of players that will play the game
      Throws:
      NumberPlayerWrongException - if the number of players is not between 2 and 4

    • getWinner

      public List<Player> getWinner()
      This method decides the winner trying to find the player with the maximum number of points, otherwise it calls the private method checkOtherConditions

      Returns:
      the list of the winner/winners

    • addToGame

      public void addToGame(String nickname) throws GameFullException, NicknameAlreadyInUseException, NicknameInvalidException
      This method adds the new Player to the game calling the private method setPlayer It checks if the game is full It checks if the nickname could be used It also gives the player his starting card
      Specified by:
      addToGame in interface GameInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the Player
      Throws:
      GameFullException
      NicknameAlreadyInUseException
      NicknameInvalidException
